title: The King's Golden Balls
narrative_story: The King introduced a new game to the world involving jade, tea, and insanity. Over tea, he announced a meeting of all nobles and produced two jade spheres from the tallest pagoda. Within hours, everyone had gone crazy. The Emperor arrived to investigate, and the whole court was consumed—even logic had fled. Only the Lord of the Eastern Province remained sane. The King tried bribery with gold, copper, and finally torture by needle. In frustration, he hammered a nail through the game board and carved an inscription: 'This game will destroy us all.'
narrative_arc: A king's game of jade balls drives the entire court mad, until only one sane lord remains to witness the destruction
callbacks: Lord recalls Dynasty from Lesson 3; Copper recalls Shellfish from Lesson 4
memory_palace: The Jade Throne Room and Golden Vaults

characters.narrative_position: The King wanted TO INTRODUCE something new to his world
characters.mnemonic_image: Person split in two by armor - formally presenting oneself
characters.story: I INTRODUCE myself to the executioner. 'JYEH!' I COMMAND my name into the record - the last time anyone will speak it before the blade falls.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp formal declaration before death

characters.narrative_position: The King wanted to introduce something new to his WORLD
characters.mnemonic_image: Field + introduce = the boundaries that divide worlds
characters.story: I cross the BOUNDARY between worlds. 'JYEH!' I COMMAND my soul forward - but the underworld has different rules, and I'm not welcome.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp transgression of forbidden borders

characters.narrative_position: Over TEA, he announced a meeting of all nobles
characters.mnemonic_image: Grass + person + tree = leaves harvested for bitter drink
characters.story: The TEA burns my throat - it's poisoned. I GASP 'CHAH?!' as the bitter leaves do their work, my host smiling serenely across the table.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising realization of betrayal

characters.narrative_position: Over tea, he announced a MEETING of all nobles
characters.mnemonic_image: Lid + container + many gathering = people assembled under one roof
characters.sound_bridge: HWAY = 'AWAY to the meeting of death'
characters.story: This MEETING will decide my fate. 'HWAY!' the tribunal COMMANDS - guilty. I can only watch as they sign my execution order.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp verdict delivered

characters.narrative_position: 'I have created a game,' he said. 'It will FIT our greatness.'
characters.mnemonic_image: Lid + mouth = closing perfectly, fitting together
characters.story: The coffin lid FITS perfectly over my still-breathing body. I GASP 'HUH?!' - they're burying me alive, and the seal is airtight.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising horror at perfect entombment

characters.narrative_position: 'HA!' laughed the court—they assumed he was joking
characters.mnemonic_image: Mouth + fit = the sound of laughter fitting through lips
characters.story: I laugh 'HA!' as madness takes me, SINGING 'HAHHHHH!' - sustained and unhinged - the only response left to unspeakable horror.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained laughter of the broken mind

characters.narrative_position: From the tallest PAGODA, the King produced two jade spheres
characters.mnemonic_image: Earth + grass + fit = tower rising from ground to sky
characters.story: They lock me in the PAGODA's highest room. I GROAN 'Tahhh...' - low and despairing - knowing I'll die here, forgotten above the clouds.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural despair of imprisonment

characters.narrative_position: From the tallest pagoda, the KING produced two jade spheres
characters.mnemonic_image: Three horizontal lines connected - heaven, humanity, earth united by the ruler
characters.story: The KING sentences me without trial. I GASP 'WAHNG?!' - but there's no appeal when heaven, earth, and man all condemn you.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising outrage at royal injustice

characters.narrative_position: The King produced two JADE spheres
characters.mnemonic_image: King with a dot - the precious stone that marks true royalty
characters.sound_bridge: YOO = 'YOU want my jade? Over my corpse'
characters.story: They pry the JADE from my dead fingers. 'YOO!' I COMMAND from beyond - but ghosts can't stop thieves from desecrating graves.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp curse from the violated tomb
primitives: 丶 dot (the flaw that proves authenticity)

characters.narrative_position: 'Behold—the BALLS!'
characters.mnemonic_image: Jade + seek = the precious orb everyone desires
characters.sound_bridge: CHYOW = 'CHEW on this orb of power'
characters.story: The jade BALL rolls from my severed hand. I GASP 'CHYOW?!' - watching it disappear into the gutter with my last hopes.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising despair as treasure escapes

characters.narrative_position: He PRESENTED them to the court
characters.mnemonic_image: Jade + see = to manifest, to make present before eyes
characters.story: The ghost APPEARS before me in the PRESENT moment. 'SHYAN!' I COMMAND it to leave - but the dead don't take orders from the living.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp demand to the manifested spirit

characters.narrative_position: The nobles began TO PLAY
characters.mnemonic_image: Jade + origin = playing with precious things, toying with fate
characters.story: The emperor PLAYS with my life like a jade toy. I GASP 'WAHN?!' - realizing I'm just entertainment for his boredom.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising horror at being someone's plaything

characters.narrative_position: Within hours, everyone had gone CRAZY
characters.mnemonic_image: Dog + king = a rabid beast with royal power
characters.story: The CRAZY emperor froths like a rabid dog. I GASP 'KWAHNG?!' as he orders another mass execution - madness with absolute power.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising terror at royal insanity

characters.narrative_position: The EMPEROR arrived to investigate
characters.mnemonic_image: White + king = the supreme ruler, radiant above all kings
characters.story: The EMPEROR's white robes hide bloodstains. I GASP 'HWAHNG?!' - bowing to a monster because the alternative is death.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising revulsion masked as reverence

characters.narrative_position: His robes were RESPLENDENT
characters.mnemonic_image: Fire + emperor = blazing glory, magnificent radiance
characters.story: The RESPLENDENT flames consume the palace. I GASP 'HWAHNG?!' - the emperor's glory literally burning down around his golden throne.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising awe at magnificent destruction

characters.narrative_position: All nobles were required TO SUBMIT their scores
characters.mnemonic_image: Mouth + king's base = presenting tribute to royalty
characters.story: I SUBMIT my daughter as tribute. I GASP 'CHUHNG?!' - but the emperor's appetite for flesh leaves no room for refusal.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising shame at forced submission

characters.narrative_position: The WHOLE court was consumed
characters.mnemonic_image: Roof/person + jade = completeness, everything under one roof
characters.story: My WHOLE family is gone - every single one. I GASP 'CHWAN?!' - the completeness of loss leaving nothing but hollow echoes.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising comprehension of total devastation

characters.narrative_position: Even LOGIC had fled
characters.mnemonic_image: Jade + village/pattern = the underlying order in precious things
characters.story: LOGIC fails me in the torture chamber. I GROAN 'Leee...' - low and broken - because reason has no place where cruelty rules.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural surrender of rational thought

characters.narrative_position: Only the LORD of the Eastern Province remained sane
characters.mnemonic_image: Dot above king's base - the flame of authority, the one in charge
characters.story: The LORD owns everything, including me. I GROAN 'Jooo...' - low and servile - another piece of property in his collection.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural acknowledgment of subjugation

characters.narrative_position: He refused TO POUR his attention into the game
characters.mnemonic_image: Water + lord = pouring libations, focused attention
characters.story: I POUR molten lead down the traitor's throat. 'JOO!' I COMMAND - the master's justice flowing hot and final.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp execution of terrible orders

characters.narrative_position: The King offered GOLD as a bribe
characters.mnemonic_image: Roof over two nuggets buried in earth - treasure hidden underground
characters.sound_bridge: JEEN = 'JEAN's worth her weight in gold'
characters.story: The GOLD weighs down my corpse, anchoring me to the riverbed. I SING 'JEENNNN!' - sustained bubbles escaping my drowned mouth forever.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained drowning with golden chains

characters.narrative_position: Then COPPER—cheaper, but still shiny
characters.mnemonic_image: Gold/metal + same = the lesser metal, similar but not precious
characters.story: The COPPER brand sizzles against my cheek. I GASP 'TOHNG?!' - the cheap metal marking me as property forever.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising pain of permanent marking

characters.narrative_position: He even tried TO FISH for the Lord's interest
characters.mnemonic_image: Gold/metal + ladle/hook = fishing with metal hook
characters.story: I FISH the corpse from the river with my hook. 'DYAOW!' I COMMAND the body to surface - another victim of the emperor's purge.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp retrieval of the dead

characters.narrative_position: He threatened him with a NEEDLE—torture by acupuncture
characters.mnemonic_image: Gold/metal + ten = the thin metal point
characters.story: The NEEDLE slides under my fingernail. I SING 'JUHNNNN!' - sustained screaming as the interrogator extracts confessions one sliver at a time.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained agony of needle torture

characters.narrative_position: He hammered a NAIL through the game board
characters.mnemonic_image: Gold/metal + nail head = the fastener driven through
characters.story: The NAIL drives through my palm into the beam. I SING 'DEENGGG!' - sustained and ringing like the hammer blows that crucify me.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained crucifixion agony

characters.narrative_position: He carved an INSCRIPTION: 'This game will destroy us all.'
characters.mnemonic_image: Gold/metal + name = words carved permanently in metal
characters.story: The INSCRIPTION on my tombstone lies about my crimes. I GASP 'MEENG?!' - even in death, they write false history on my grave.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising outrage at posthumous slander

characters.narrative_position: Then he sat back, suddenly CALM—the only sane man in a kingdom of fools
characters.mnemonic_image: Gold/metal + truth/real = using weight to settle, to pacify
characters.story: They SUPPRESS the rebellion with mass executions. 'JUHN!' the general COMMANDS - the town finally calm, finally silent, finally empty of the living.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp order that brings terrible peace
